article.title: Lockheed Martin Wins GSA Contract to Support Application Needs for Federal Acquisition Service
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin has been awarded a Basic Purchase Agreement with a ceiling value of $400 million by the General Services Administration to provide software and systems support to the Federal Acquisition Service. Under the contract, Lockheed Martin will perform task orders consisting of mission critical applications, contract transition activities and program management.
